Uses of Package
org.waarp.common.logging

  • Packages that use org.waarp.common.logging 
    Package Description
    org.waarp.common.filemonitor
    This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.
    org.waarp.common.logging
    Classes implementing logging facility
    org.waarp.common.service
    Interface for Apache Daemon tool to run as a Service (Windows or Unix) one program
    org.waarp.openr66.client
    Classes implementing Clients
    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.networkhandler
    Classes implementing Network Handler (multiplexing local handlers)
    org.waarp.openr66.protocol.utils
    Classes implementing Utilities
    org.waarp.openr66.r66gui
    Adaptation to Administrator
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.logging used by org.waarp.common.filemonitor 
    Class and Description
    WaarpLogger
    Internal-use-only logger used by Waarp.
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.logging used by org.waarp.common.logging 
    Class and Description
    AbstractWaarpLogger
    A skeletal implementation of WaarpLogger.
    SysErrLogger
    Utility class to be used only in classes where WaarpLogger is not allowed
    WaarpLogger
    Internal-use-only logger used by Waarp.
    WaarpLoggerFactory
    Creates an WaarpLogger or changes the default factory implementation.
    WaarpLogLevel
    The log level that WaarpLogger can log at.
  • Classes in org.waarp.common.logging used by org.waarp.common.service 
    Class and Description
    WaarpLogger
    Internal-use-only logger used by Waarp.
